What is the main purpose of the Verus project, a corporate-backed initiative?

The Verus project is not a corporate-backed initiative. It's a community project created by "regular Joes" with the goal of promoting decentralization and putting power back in the hands of individuals.

## Closing Thoughts

As a community project of just regular Joes, it can’t be stressed enough how important each and every one of us all are. The true power of decentralization is putting power back in the hands of **YOU**.
